title: 05.ru Marketplace
description: "05.ru" is a chain of electronics and home appliance stores. As of today, the company operates 7 branches: 6 in the Republic of Dagestan (in Makhachkala, Khasavyurt, and Derbent) and 1 store in Moscow. The "05.ru" online store provides delivery services across Russia.
responsibilities: Conducted research, gathered information, and selected a set of technologies for the project development.
Engaged in backend PHP Laravel development, specifically focusing on API implementation.
Developed microservices as part of the project architecture.
Received requirements from analysts and translated them into technical tasks.
Took part in project architectural design alongside the architect.
Configured Docker environment to streamline the development process.
Developed CLI bash scripts to automate routine development processes within the company.
Implemented scripts for processing Excel documents.
Handled data processing and transformation tasks.
Configured CRON schedules for automated tasks.
Contributed to the project's Software as a Service (SaaS) and Platform as a Service (PaaS) aspects.
